name: Consorzio Italiano Compostatori
goal: To promote the development of source separated collection of organic waste, for use in the production of biogas and compost. To promote the use of high quality compost in farming, flower culture and other uses. To promote the use of compostable packaging materials destined to composting plants.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: End of waste, animal by product regulation, fertilizer regulation; circular economy
